title: Login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid email and password and is redirected to the dashboard with appropriate permissions.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid registered email and correct password
Click on the login button
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard page
Verify that dashboard displays data according to user's role and sector permissions

title: Login with invalid credentials
description: Verify that the system rejects login attempts with incorrect email or password and displays clear error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid email with incorrect password
Click on the login button
Verify that login fails with an error message about invalid credentials

title: Password reset flow
description: Validate that a user can successfully reset their password using the password recovery option and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click on the 'forgot password' link
Enter registered email and submit password reset request
Verify that a confirmation message is shown indicating email sent for password reset

title: Dashboard load with role-based data
description: Verify the main dashboard loads with metrics and information filtered appropriately by user role and sector permissions.

steps.description: Login as user with specific sector and role
Navigate to dashboard
Verify dashboard metrics, allocations, tasks, and recados are filtered by the user's sector
Verify role-specific widgets and information are displayed correctly

title: Create, edit, delete script categories
description: Verify that users with coordinator permissions can create new script categories, edit existing ones, and delete them, with changes persisting.

steps.description: Login as coordinator
Navigate to script categories management
Create a new script category with valid data
Verify the new category appears in the list
Edit the newly created category's name
Verify that the edited name is saved and shown correctly
Delete the category
Verify the category is removed from the list

title: Scripts drag-and-drop reordering
description: Validate that scripts within a category can be reordered using drag-and-drop and that the order is saved and restored after refresh.

steps.description: Login with appropriate permissions
Navigate to scripts page and open a category with multiple scripts
Drag a script from its position to a new position within the list
Verify that the visual order updates immediately
Refresh the page
Verify that the changed order persists after reload

title: Copy script content to clipboard
description: Verify that clicking the copy button on a script copies the script text to the clipboard and shows a confirmation toast.

steps.description: Login as user
Navigate to scripts module
Click on copy icon/button for a specific script
Verify clipboard contains the expected script text
Verify a confirmation toast notification is displayed

title: Exam management CRUD operations
description: Verify that user with coordinator permissions can create, edit, view details and delete medical exams with all related fields correctly handled.

steps.description: Login as coordinator
Navigate to exams module
Create a new exam with valid data including code, preparation instructions, anestesia and linked values
Verify the new exam appears correctly in the list
Open exam details modal for the created exam
Verify detailed information is displayed correctly
Edit the exam information and save changes
Verify changes are saved and reflected in the list and details
Delete the exam
Verify exam is removed and no longer accessible

title: Contact management with clusters and contact points
description: Verify creation, editing, viewing and deletion of contact groups (clusters) and their contact points, ensuring hierarchical relationships are maintained.

steps.description: Login as coordinator
Navigate to contacts module
Create a new contact cluster with a name and description
Verify cluster appears in the list
Add one or more contact points to the cluster with valid phone, email or notes
Verify contact points appear under the cluster with correct information
Edit a contact point's details and save
Verify updates persist
Delete a contact point and delete the cluster
Verify deletions remove the items from the interface

title: Click-to-call and click-to-WhatsApp functionality in contacts
description: Verify that phone numbers support click-to-call action and WhatsApp numbers open the WhatsApp interface correctly when clicked.

steps.description: Login as user
Navigate to contacts and locate contact points with phone and WhatsApp numbers
Verify click on phone number triggers phone call action (or tel: link)
Verify click on WhatsApp number opens WhatsApp chat interface or link

title: Medical value table import via Excel
description: Verify that coordinators can import complex medical value tables via Excel files and that the data updates correctly with feedback about errors or successful import.

steps.description: Login as coordinator
Navigate to the values table management page
Upload a valid Excel file with values for procedures, fees and gender-based pricing
Verify the data is parsed and loaded correctly in the system
Verify a success notification is displayed

title: Value table import with invalid Excel file
description: Verify that the system detects invalid Excel file format or corrupted data during upload and shows detailed error messages without corrupting existing data.

steps.description: Login as coordinator
Navigate to the values table import interface
Upload an invalid or malformed Excel file
Verify a clear error message is shown describing the import problem
Verify existing value tables remain unchanged

title: Professional management actions
description: Verify that professionals can be created, edited with specialties and contact details, viewed with details, and deleted appropriately by authorized users.

steps.description: Login as coordinator
Navigate to professionals module
Create a new professional with required and optional data including specialties and contact info
Verify the new professional appears in the list
Edit professional details and save
Verify changes are reflected
View professional details in detail modal or page
Verify detailed info including specialties and history are displayed
Delete the professional record
Verify the professional is removed from the list

title: Consult√≥rios (Offices) CRUD and categorization
description: Verify creation, editing, deleting and categorizing offices with schedules, allocations, and related professionals function correctly within the system.

steps.description: Login as coordinator
Navigate to offices module
Create a new office with category, hours, attendees and linked professionals
Verify office is listed with correct details
Edit office information including schedule and professionals
Verify updates are saved and displayed
Delete an office record
Verify office is removed

title: Annotations and stoma annotations management
description: Validate creation, editing, searching and privacy settings of general annotations and specialized stoma therapy notes with tags and attachments.

steps.description: Login as user
Navigate to annotations module
Create a new annotation with tags and optional attachment upload
Verify annotation appears in list and details
Edit annotation, including changing privacy settings
Verify privacy and changes persist and affect visibility
Search annotations by tag and keywords
Verify search returns appropriate results

title: Internal messaging (recados) creation and filtering
description: Verify users can create internal messages, filter messages by sector, and view message history with timestamps correctly.

steps.description: Login as user
Navigate to internal messages (recados) module
Create a new message targeted to user or sector groups
Verify message appears in the list with correct timestamp
Use sector filter to view messages only related to specific sector
Verify messages are correctly filtered and displayed

title: User management by administrators
description: Verify that administrators can create, edit, assign roles and sectors, and delete user accounts, enforcing correct role-based restrictions and permissions.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Navigate to user management module
Create a new user with email, role (admin/user), and assign sectors
Verify new user is created and listed with correct roles and sectors
Edit user roles and sector assignments
Verify updates are saved and reflected in permissions
Delete a user
Verify user is removed and access revoked

title: Global real-time search functionality
description: Verify that the global search bar returns real-time, accurate results grouped by data type and respects user permissions.

steps.description: Login as user
Access global search via header or keyboard shortcut (Ctrl/Cmd + K)
Type partial and full keywords for scripts, exams, contacts, professionals, and notes
Verify results update in real-time as user types
Verify results are grouped by data categories
Verify results only include items the user has permission to access

title: Data migration with JSON import and validation
description: Validate that authorized users can perform data migration by importing JSON files, with validation preventing corrupted or invalid data and options for replacement or sync.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Navigate to data migration interface
Upload a valid JSON export file for data migration
Verify JSON structure validates successfully
Choose migration options: full replacement or synchronization
Confirm data migration process
Verify data in the system reflects imported data accordingly without errors

title: Data migration with invalid JSON file
description: Verify the system rejects invalid or malformed JSON files during data migration and provides a clear error message without impacting existing data.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Navigate to data migration interface
Upload an invalid or corrupted JSON file
Verify validation error is shown with details on failure
Verify current system data remains unchanged

title: Theme toggling and persistence
description: Verify dark/light theme toggle works, detects system preferences on first load, and persists user preference across sessions.

steps.description: Open application in browser respecting system dark mode settings
Verify UI theme matches system preference by default
Toggle theme manually from settings or theme switcher
Verify UI theme switches immediately
Reload the application
Verify chosen theme is persisted and applied

title: Responsive layout and mobile adaptation
description: Verify that the application layout including sidebar, header, modals and lists adapts correctly and remains usable on various screen sizes including mobile devices.

steps.description: Open application on desktop resolution
Verify sidebar, header and content layout are displayed properly
Resize window or open on mobile device or emulator
Verify sidebar collapses or changes to mobile friendly menu
Verify modals and content are scrollable and usable on small screens

title: Form validation with Zod schemas
description: Verify all data entry forms for scripts, exams, professionals, offices and annotations validate input data with proper error messages inline on invalid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to any data entry form (e.g. new script or exam creation)
Submit form with empty mandatory fields
Verify inline validation error messages prompt the user to fill required fields
Input data with invalid formats or out-of-bound values
Verify specific validation errors appear for each invalid input
Correct all validation errors and submit form successfully
Verify form submission succeeds and data is saved

title: Realtime data updates via Supabase Realtime
description: Verify that changes made to data in one session are pushed and updated in real-time in other logged-in sessions without refresh.

steps.description: Login as user in two different browser windows or devices
In one window, create/edit a data record such as a script or exam
Verify that the change is reflected in the other session's UI instantly or within defined realtime delay

title: Row Level Security enforcement on sensitive data
description: Verify that users cannot access sensitive data they are unauthorized for, as enforced by Supabase row level security policies.

steps.description: Login as a user with restricted sector or role
Attempt to access data from another sector or restricted categories such as other users' notes or sensitive exams
Verify access is denied or no data is returned
